message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer for the product is $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid I need to make a bit more than $850000 to make this deal worthwhile for me. My counteroffer is $920000. I believe this is still a reasonable price considering the product's value to you.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $880000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm still not sure if $880000 is enough for me to consider selling the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so my counteroffer is $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go a bit lower and offer $870000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. My counteroffer is $910000. I believe this is the best we can do considering the product's value to you.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go a bit lower and offer $890000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I really need to get closer to my minimum price. My counteroffer is $900000 is too low for me, so I'm going to try to meet you in the middle of that. My counteroffer is $895000. I believe this is the best we can do considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go a bit lower and offer $885000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
